title: Meal count assistants, adult supervisors, and
context: [ยง302A-641] Meal count assistants, adult supervisors, and classroom cleaners; minimum wage. Except as provided in section 387-9, the wages of meal count assistants, adult supervisors, and classroom cleaners of the department shall be no less than the current state minimum wage as required in section 387-2. [L 2005, c 191, ยง1]
